description: Non-material amendment to planning permission dated 26/02/2024 ref 2023/4401 (Demolition of existing garages and erection of 2-storey building to provide 3 x 1-bedroom and 3 x 2-bedroom flats with associated car and cycle parking, refuse storage and landscaping) to allow relocation of building footprint and amendment to conditions 2 and 14 to allow for the change in drawings.
site_name: Garages To The South East Of 63 To 75
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - Conditions amended as follows:

Condition 2: The development shall be carried out in accordance with the reports, specifications and drawings detailed [Design & Access Statement, including Landscape Strategy by WW+P and Allen Pyke Associates, Air Quality Assessment by NoiseAir; Archaeological Desk-Based Assessment by Fullerlong; Biodiversity Net Gain Assessment by The Ecology Partnership; Preliminary Ecology Appraisal by The Ecology Partnership; Ground Investigation by Listers Geotechnics; Daylight and Sunlight Reports by Right of Light; Fire Strategy by Tetra Tech; Utilities Statement by Amber Utilities; Heritage Impact Assessment by Jon Wright Heritage; Planning Statement by Stantec UK Ltd; Statement of Community Involvement by Stantec UK Ltd; Surface Water Drainage Report & Strategy by Tullys; Energy and Sustainability Strategy by McCarthy Bainbridge; Transport Statement and Waste Management Plan by Paul Mew Associates; Arboricultural Impact Assessment; Method Statement & Tree Protection Plan by Trevor Heaps Ltd; Landscaping response (3054-APA-ZZ-XX-FN-L-4014) dated 08/01/24; 9952 WWP GE ZZ DR A 00 501 P.02; 952 WWP GE 00 DR A 01 502 P.02; 952 WWP GE 01 DR A 01 503 P.02; 952 WWP GE RF DR A 01 504 P.02; 952 WWP GE ZZ DR A 20 502 P.02; 952 WWP GE ZZ DR A 20 503 P.02; 952 WWP GE ZZ DR A 25 502 P.01; revised balcony details (02/02/24) and 3054-APA-SH-GF-DR-L-1011 T00.

Reason: To ensure a satisfactory standard of development and to allow the local planning authority to review any potential changes to the scheme.  

Condition 14: The landscape works and planting shown on approved drawing numbered [3054-APA-SH-GF-DR-L-1011 T00] shall be carried out prior to the occupation of the development, or in accordance with a programme agreed in writing with the local planning authority.  
Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance and to provide biodiversity interest, in accordance with Council policies LP1, LP2 and LP56 of the Wandsworth Local Plan coupled with the requ
